md:
giải nghĩa từ "mask" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Mask (noun) - Mặt nạ
	+ Meaning: A covering for the face or part of the face, worn to conceal one's identity, to protect oneself from the elements, or as a disguise.
	+ Example: The robber wore a mask to hide his face during the heist.
	+ Related words: disguise, veil, conceal, hide

* Mask (verb) - Che giấu
	+ Meaning: To cover or conceal something, especially one's feelings or intentions.
	+ Example: She tried to mask her disappointment with a smile.
	+ Related words: conceal, hide, disguise, cover

* Mask (computer science) - Mặt nạ (trong tin học)
	+ Meaning: A bit pattern that is used to select or modify specific bits in a binary data word.
	+ Example: The programmer used a mask to extract the relevant data from the binary file.
	+ Related words: bit, pattern, binary, data

Note: The meanings and examples provided are just a few of the many possible interpretations of the word "mask". The word can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used.

  • Mask (noun) - Mặt nạ

    • Meaning: A covering for the face or part of the face, worn to conceal one's identity, to protect oneself from the elements, or as a disguise.
    • Example: The robber wore a mask to hide his face during the heist.
    • Related words: disguise, veil, conceal, hide

  • Mask (verb) - Che giấu

    • Meaning: To cover or conceal something, especially one's feelings or intentions.
    • Example: She tried to mask her disappointment with a smile.
    • Related words: conceal, hide, disguise, cover

  • Mask (computer science) - Mặt nạ (trong tin học)

    • Meaning: A bit pattern that is used to select or modify specific bits in a binary data word.
    • Example: The programmer used a mask to extract the relevant data from the binary file.
    • Related words: bit, pattern, binary, data

Note: The meanings and examples provided are just a few of the many possible interpretations of the word "mask". The word can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used.
